readme:
# Hajo

## Create hajo with me :)
[Suggest new hajo feature](https://goo.gl/forms/LW03IQuaELo64Kbm1)

## Working on
* sesions
* cookies proxy - use cookie like it was a object
* documentation

## Instalation
```
npm install hajo --save
```
## createServer

```javascript
const { createServer } = require('hajo')

const server = createServer(__dirname)
```

## on

```typescript
server.on(
    method: String,
    url: (url: String) => Boolean | String | RegExp,
    action: (request: IncomingMessage, response?: ServerResponse, data: Object) => void | String
): Server
```

```javascript
server.on('GET', '/', 'index.hmtl')
```

```javascript
server.on('GET', /.*/, (request, response) => {

})
```

```javascript
server.on('GET', url => ture, (request, response, data) => {

})
```

## redirect

```typescript
server.redirect(
    method: String,
    from: (url: String) => Boolean | String | RegExp,
    to: (url: String) => String | String
): Server
```

```javascript
server.on('*', '/app', '/application')
```


### listen

```typescript
server.listen(port: Number): Server
```

### printRoutes

```typescript
server.printRoutes(): Server
```

### addFileExtRoute

```typescript
server.addFileExtRoute(): Server
```
